website_summaries.verdict: If you need to make some serious noise at a sporting event, this extra-loud cowbell is certain to pull in plenty of attention.
cons: A little heavy, but it’s a big cowbell

customer_reviews.title: Too much cowbell? SO MUCH COWBELL.
customer_reviews.text: I broke this bad boy out at a Little League championship game. Birds dropped dead from the sky. I can't even transport it. I tried wrapping it in a sweatshirt and it still clanked around like I had a sack full of gnomes playing horseshoes. You could tie it to a buoy and keep freighters off the rocks. It's loud.
customer_reviews.author: David Traver Adolphus

customer_reviews.title: Magnum Found through Melodious Clanking
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself to be a connoisseur of cowbells. I've been a professional jazz cowbell player since I was 3 years old growing up in the backwoods of Omaha (the true origin of jazz cowbell playing). I have a collection of over 2,322.4 cowbells and have never been satisfied. That was until I stumbled across this beauty. This cowbell is the Magnum of cowbells. Let's start with the silky black handle. It almost seems like it was meant for my hand...smooth, yet familiar during my first jam session. When I performed behind Phil's Foodway last Saturday night....there was a not a dry eye in the parking lot. Beauty was found that day in the form of melodious clanking.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the cow bell. Bought it to teach my horse to ring a bell. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy G

customer_reviews.title: Great for waking up my lazy kid
customer_reviews.text: Loud! Woke up my son with this when he overslept. I think his heart skipped a few beats.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Loud and awesome
customer_reviews.text: Oh the fun we can have with this one. Took it on our Halloween camping trip weekend. My husband had to ring the bell every hour on the hour... or as close to it as he could get. We suddenly found many others in the park that had similar bells to it and rang along with him shouting "Bring out your dead". Camping trips will not be the same again. :) Fun times It was not as loud as I thought it would be when you are standing next to it but you can hear it from a long way away. very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Loud and very sturdy bell
customer_reviews.text: Great bell. Very loud. We have about 4 acres of wooded land behind the house and the boys can hear it down at the lake. Bought this because they could not hear me holler when dinner was ready!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is LOUD! Great for the football games & will definitely annoy those people who don't want to cheer with you! :) If you hold it up to ring it, sometimes it got caught on itself, so would stop - but that could be a user error, too... I was ringing it pretty hard.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Jones

customer_reviews.title: This is the best cowbell out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cowbell out there! Very loud and solid sound - can't be missed! On the flip side - it's a little heavy and your hand/wrist will be little sore if you ring it quite a bit. But well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sc

customer_reviews.title: Only good for shaking, do not strike it with stick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cowbell and removed the clapper inside so I could strike the bell with a drum stick. Since this cowbell is cheaply made with only a few welds on the inside, one of the welds broke after a few days of playing, causing a unbearable buzzing sound every time I hit it. After I threw away this bell, I bought a professional cowbell which has a long continuous weld that goes all the way up the seems on both sides of the bell. For a few dollars more you can buy a good quality Pearl bell here on Amazon, or if you want to go top of the line, buy a LP or Meinl cowbell.
customer_reviews.author: ScottUSA

customer_reviews.title: All Smiles!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Loud, My wife says to loud. Solid, I don't think I will ever be able to break it through use. We love it, our section mates at the hockey games, well, they tolerate it.. :) We also have it's 7 inch little brother. It is very nice and made just as well, but if you don't mind carrying the extra size this one is more than worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: This bell is LOUD and the handle allows for continuous ...
customer_reviews.text: This bell is LOUD and the handle allows for continuous (and comfortable) hard bell ringing -unlike other bells with traditional welds
customer_reviews.author: chefdub

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I bought this expecting a cheap piece of junk to use for cheering a friend on at a race. It was completely the opposite. Top notch product. Best cowbell I’ve used. I don’t know if it’s instrument quality, but you won’t go wrong if you’re looking to use to cheer at an event
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made and Loud
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect for our purpose - calling the chickens home. Every time we feed the chickens we ring the bell. After only a few days of this, to get the chickens to come home, all we had to do is ring the bell; and they come running from wherever they were. So, we know the bell carries at least as far as the chickens wander.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Nice and LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Really LOUD bell...great for summoning help to a sick person. Actually, i use it hanging on a rope outside so the dog can let me know she wants to come in. I'l l have to buy another for the sick room use.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth claire

customer_reviews.title: Loud, but not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but needs to be made of better materials for heavy use (hockey games). The clapper is massive and dents the bell from the inside. The clapper hanger wire will break eventually and the clapper ball will go flying....hope it doesn't hit someone. I replaced the clapper ball loop and clapper hanger wire with 1/8 steel rod by welding it in. Also had to weld the bell housing frame on one. BUT...... THUNDEROUS NOISE!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Boes

customer_reviews.title: It’s Loud but paint pealing off already
customer_reviews.text: Paint is chipping off and Just got it last week , haven’t really used it :-( It’s loud and that’s what I needed so not sending it back but if you want durablilty this isn’t for you
customer_reviews.author: Mary L L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for running events
customer_reviews.text: Cowbells are common noise makers for running events, but this is one dominates! Runners can hear it from blocks away. It's holding up well too. There is no play in the handle after multiple hours at multiple races. It puts a smile on most runners' faces, especially when you shout, "You look like you need more cowbell!" before you start clanging. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calls the kids home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cause I was tired of shouting to get my kids to come inside when they're playing outside and then tracking them down on our large property when they couldnt hear me. With this, I don't have to shout and they can always hear it! It's very loud! And seems very sturdy and well made. The neighbors have a triangle and we have this so the kids know whose mom is calling them home based on the noise.
customer_reviews.author: tmriddle314

customer_reviews.title: It's a little out of tune when hit by a drum stick.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to be used by hitting with a drum stick. Think "more cowbell!" We cut the center ball thing out but the cow bell is out of tune. We fixed that by stomping on it a few times. But thought that was odd since it's designed to be a musical instrument vs actually being worn on a cow.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: LOUDEST EVER
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is a super loud cowbell with very little effort. I can use it to call my kids home from a VERY long distance. It has been banned from inside the house use by my husband. I LOVE IT! It's probably too loud for a cheering section at a sporting event because you will deafen the person in front of you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loudest Cowbell Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 cowbells in the pro shop of our high school stadium a few years ago and I never thought they were loud enough. So I finally did a search on Amazon and found these and the great reviews. I was convinced on buying 2 of these bells and boy are they loud!!! Tomorrow our Dragons are playing in the 2nd round of the playoffs in Dallas Cowboys AT&T stadium and you bet I'm bringing these cowbells with us! This is exactly what I need to TX high school football!!
customer_reviews.author: jfsmetana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was the loudest cow bell enthusiast cheering on my sister at the finish line of her first marathon!
customer_reviews.author: free elf

customer_reviews.title: More Cowbell!
customer_reviews.text: Great for sporting events! This cowbell has started a movement at a minor league baseball team that my friends and I have season tickets to!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Hollar

customer_reviews.title: Very loud but a subpar handle
customer_reviews.text: The handle on these are not very great, probably want to super glue them on. I bought these with the intention of using mountain bike handlebar grips though, so it didn’t bother me. With that said, I could see it being an issue for others. They are however very loud and sturdy. After 5 hours of use, I’d say they were a good deal so far.
customer_reviews.author: SemiSecure

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly loud!
customer_reviews.text: I grabbed this bell instead of a more traditional shape for a retreat where we were going to be using the bell to gather folks when they emerge scattered across the retreat grounds. It’s fantastic! This this was crazy loud and easily audible from a distance. The one I purchased was being donated, but now I want one for myself, too!
customer_reviews.author: SMP

customer_reviews.title: Broke frist time.
customer_reviews.text: First hockey game, players coming onto ice and ball falls off before all players get on ice. Junk
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: This bell is loud enough to make the people in ...
customer_reviews.text: This bell is loud enough to make the people in the stands near you uncomfortable at football games. Worth every penny. The only improvement would be to add a wrist loop to prevent accidental throwing. My dog hates this bell.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Loooooove it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for high school football and it didn’t disappoint! It’s loud...I mean really loud. It’s a make your player roll his eyes loud. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Ring out with joy
customer_reviews.text: Use it at all soccer games. Sounds like ringing the bells at Notre Dame in Paris. I feel like the hunchback of Notre Dame. The team loves the sound when they score. One problem. Rubber handle slips off. Correct this problem with rubber cement. Poor some inside rubber handle and push back on mental extension.
customer_reviews.author: rkwsr

customer_reviews.title: I lost more than just my hearing.
customer_reviews.text: The beautiful intonations emanating from this percussive instrument were lost when my son rattled this behind my head, making two feelings drop out of my back molars and 1/8 of my vision in my right eye turning to white noise static. Cant wait to use it as a wake up alarm when he hits junior high school.
customer_reviews.author: Old Mac Man

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Super loud bell! I get the most compliments when I take this out to the football games. It is great quality and super awesome quality!
customer_reviews.author: Leeann

customer_reviews.title: I've Got A Fever And The Only Prescription Is More Cowbell!
customer_reviews.text: More Cowbell Baby! I purchased this for coaching my swim team so when we do kicking drills I can ring the bell to indicate switching speeds. Anyhow, this bell is the bee's knees. I mean--It is loud enough for all my swimmers to hear it over the loud noises of a natatorium! If you have ever spent time inside an indoor pool, you know how loud a pool can be! Biggest Plus---It's fun to ring the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Delightful Resonance

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use at hockey games. It is loud!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H

customer_reviews.title: perfect for our nightly city cheer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cowbell for my partner to ring during our city's nightly cheer of frontline workers and essential personnel during the pandemic. It is LOUD. I have to ask him to stand at the other end of the porch when he's ringing it, and the sound easily travels through the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S. Willis

customer_reviews.title: ) Just an AWESOME cowbell!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these... one to cheer my wife in at the end of a kayak race, and one to keep at my office to clang every time we close a real estate deal (on average every 2.5 days.) Just an AWESOME cowbell!!! So freaking loud and legit! I'd buy the exact same one again. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew (9 years old) to annoy my brother. This is very loud and the perfect "gift" to give to someones child to annoy their parents.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbaa

customer_reviews.title: Loud, louder, LOUDEST
customer_reviews.text: Such a melodious racket! This is the scoring bell for my daughter's softball team. EVERYONE knows when one of our girls cross the plate. Local wildlife flees before the auditory assault and little old ladies tinkle just a little bit. If you want to be heard, this is the bell for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wojcicki

customer_reviews.title: Great as a cheer bell.
customer_reviews.text: Did someone mention loud! LOL. Bring your ear plugs if you will be cheering for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jas999

customer_reviews.title: This thing it LOUD!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bell, SOOOO LOUD!!! FYI if you want to to be courteous to those around you at a sporting event, buy some ear plugs too and pass them out, your neighbors will appreciate it...LOL
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: This Cowbell is the Real Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal!! If you're looking to make some serious noise look no further. This bad boy is solid! You can't beat the price or the quality! I used some baseball bat grip tape for the handle for a thicker grip. We use these bells for the high school football games.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother in law who is in a care facility recuperating from throat cancer surgery. First night there, he started choking. No one answered his call button. Believe me, when he rings this, everyone will be awake, so they won’t ignore him again. Great, life saving purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lentz

customer_reviews.title: Very loud and easy to ring / hold
customer_reviews.text: Used at semi-final high school football game. Pity the people who were around me! Very loud and easy to ring / hold. Very well made and can see it lasting a very long time
customer_reviews.author: D. Long

customer_reviews.title: Great cowbell!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cowbell to take to the hockey games I see every week. This one fits the bill spectacularly! Solid build quality and the tone is exactly what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Williams

customer_reviews.title: Mothers Day Present
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as kind of a joke bc my wife is that loud mom on the sidelines.....backfired immediately. She took it to the Mothers Day Tournament and rang it over and over. Great buy that I thought would be funny but turned out to be one of the best presents yet! She did like her NINJA Foodi too.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Stengel

customer_reviews.title: Loud!
customer_reviews.text: Are you looking for a loud cowbell? You found it. This thing is obnoxiously loud! Just what I wanted 😁
customer_reviews.author: Satine27

customer_reviews.title: get help when you need it (and it bothers to come)
customer_reviews.text: My friend had knee surgery and uses this to call her husband to come help. It penetrates into his noise attenuating headset well. He hears but does not always respond ... not the bell's fault.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schein

customer_reviews.title: 🥰🥰🥎🥎🥎🥎
customer_reviews.text: People mostly hate it but my team has learned to embrace it cause everyone hates it so much! 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Balcaitis

customer_reviews.title: Very loud and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to notify people when meals are on a 300 acre ranch. Very loud and sound travels great on the property! Bell is well constructed and expect it to last for years!
customer_reviews.author: K. Gwyn

customer_reviews.title: Loud!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and loud. I love it, everyone else finds it annoying or hates it. Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this as part of a Halloween costume. The sound and resonance is great. It can be heard pretty far but is not loud enough to be a nuisance. He uses it in a Halloween Haunt on a farm. The handle is well sized to hold. It also looks well made and authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived as expected & met expectation.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as expected & met expectation. LOUD!!! It is the envy of the "Cow-Bell" moms at football. Not recommended for use at bowling, gulf, tennis, or shooting sports.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: More Bell for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bell as a gift for a sports fan. I was pleased with the ring, and sturdy construction. Can't wait to see how it did during game day!
customer_reviews.author: firemansflame28

customer_reviews.title: Well made, loud cowbell
customer_reviews.text: This cowbell works great. It is very loud, which is what I wanted. I can hear it from outside.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a reason. My Uncle is hard of hearing, very... and my mother is also getting that way. He moved into her spare bedroom, and was not able to get out of bed alone. So I bought this thinking he could just ring for her!! Not so. It was not even loud enough to hear from the kitchen, just down the hall. Let alone in family room with TV on. So now it is a dust collector. But it did make a cute joke at first.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Good and loud
customer_reviews.text: Nice and loud!! Great to spook off wild life!! I'm so glad I got this bell, it's not at all heavy, long handle makes it easy to ring, its sturdy and well made, and it sends the wild life and predator's flying.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting.
customer_reviews.text: The bell worked great through our kids football season, but after one game the enamel on the ball was all chipped off and by the last game it had just broken off and fallen out. It's ten bucks and served it's purpose I just wish it was more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Walter White

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the football and cheerleading games to make some extra noise when our team wins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my sister's outdoor wedding. We spray painted it, and glued on some bling. My son used it to announce the coming of the Bride. LOL. It was great. Nice and loud.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Eri

customer_reviews.title: Great for sporting events!
customer_reviews.text: Whoa!!! I bought these for our schools annual field day. Our team definitely stood out from the crowd because the bells are so loud. They held up to a whole day of ringing and still look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drowns out the opposing team parents!
customer_reviews.text: I'm louder than the parents on the other team now! They seem to really love when I sit in "their fan section".. Or at least I think that's what they're saying, the bell is so loud I can't hear them!
customer_reviews.author: CSD Hall

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't need more cowbell? This thing seems to be very well made, clangs away just as expected. Not obnoxiously loud, certainly gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: This cowbell is LOUD!!!!  Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cowbell is LOUD! I had bought a 6 1/2 inch one on Amazon and it couldn't be heard at the football games. Now this one can be heard!!!
customer_reviews.author: Retired Teacher

customer_reviews.title: You can never have enough cowbell
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. You can never have enough cowbell
customer_reviews.author: Manbyk

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cowbell! It's somewhat loud for what were using ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cowbell! It's somewhat loud for what were using it for, but a little duct tape on the ringer helped mute the sound a little. Our boys ring it before every meal to call everyone to the dinner table 😂😂
customer_reviews.author: kgrp

customer_reviews.title: Cowbell
customer_reviews.text: This cowbell performed just as I thought it would. JJK
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jay Kay

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this bell! They can hear from anywhere on our 7-acre homestead! No more yelling "Dinner!" for this mom!
customer_reviews.author: L. Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Bell gets stuck
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint, is that the bell gets stuck very easily. The hand can easily bend when trying to straighten the bell. But it looks and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Love this cow bell - it’s loud!
customer_reviews.text: Great for high school football games or any sport. I customized mine with school colors. Blinged it up a bit but wasn’t necessary. Actually looks nice, even bought a second one and left it as it came for the hubby.
customer_reviews.author: s beaudoin

customer_reviews.title: Attention Getter
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. We have meetings in the church fellowship hall. Everybody enjoys talking and visiting. However, I need to get their attention at times.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughters cheer competitions and it worked very well for about 5 competitions, but regretfully broke today. Disappointed it didn’t last longer.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: High quality and VERY loud.
customer_reviews.text: Used this when I had surgery. My wife could never hear me when I yelled. This did the trick. SUPER LOUD!
customer_reviews.author: Kaa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and solid, great sounding
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional sound. Unfortunately arrived a bit late for my first event but will definitely be used at every game!
customer_reviews.author: Gingerann

customer_reviews.title: Super loud
customer_reviews.text: When you want to annoy someone this is the product for you. Myself, i use it a ski races. Built well and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Baron Von Nobzez

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s football games and it worked great! It was much louder than a smaller one that someone else had in the stands. My son even could hear it down on the field clearly and knew it was me cheering. Shipping was quick and it is very durable. It is DEFINITELY not appropriate for basketball games so I can’t wait until next football season to use it again. This was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: SDiegan

customer_reviews.title: Can Never Have Enough Cow Bells
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to cheer on our sons football teams and they work great. So many people asked about them the football boosters are considering selling them next season.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W., Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cowbell
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good cowbell and is loud. Bought it because my daughter will be attending Mississippi State and I painted it the school colors.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: If you want to make enough noise to be heard by EVERYONE, get this bell!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to take to the Black Fly Challenge Bike Race in Indian Lake, NY. They are very well made and I'm sure will last forever. And did I mention that they are very LOUD?
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Need more cowbell? This thing has more than enough.
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviews say this thing is very loud. You almost need to dampen the sound it's so loud.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: bought this for my mom to get my attention no ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my mom to get my attention no matter where I was in the house and it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Want to make noise?  Buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: Very loud and well made. Can't wait to use at daughters competitive cheer meets!
customer_reviews.author: RV Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Loud and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This cow bell is awesome! I’m using it at my friends graduation this winter and I’m sure it’s going to drowned out everything else, which is what she requested.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Nice and loud
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my parents who live in a farm up in the mountains. Especially during a weather emergency
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Loud, lively, laughs!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to play a game in my gym at my school. It was very effective. It’s also very loud and will get the attention of everybody within probably a mile radius. It’s loud.
customer_reviews.author: KnittedLauren

customer_reviews.title: Great noise maker
customer_reviews.text: Too bad it does not come in colors. But it's a great cow Bell. I was the loudest one at the football game
customer_reviews.author: cody boren

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Cow Bell
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my cowbell. It is sturdy and makes good loud noise. That is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Mylinda Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This will scare your kids and your dog. Not recommended for indoor use. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Priebe

customer_reviews.title: Very loud but it didnt hold up
customer_reviews.text: This bell is loud and pretty awesome. But the weld broke on the ball late in the 2nd quarter. Pretty disappointing as it was the semi final playoff game. I'm going to order another one Hoping the first one was a fluke. But it is made in China. I hope it will make it through the State Championship game on Saturday.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Should’ve listened to reviews. Wasn’t that loud and the piece kept getting caught.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cree

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: It's LOUD! I love it! I use it to cheer on my son's football team.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxon

customer_reviews.title: Marathon worthy
customer_reviews.text: Marathon worthy!! My daughter ran the NY Marathon and I used these to cheer her and the other runners on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Pires

customer_reviews.title: This bell is heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good tone, quite loud, but heavy. Clapper binds up from time to time if bell is held upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E Pitoniak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bell! Good tone, loud and always gets compliments!
customer_reviews.author: R. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Very loud and heavy duty. You could actually put it in a cow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great noisemaker without being obnoxious!
customer_reviews.text: Can be heard over the roar of a cheering crowd. It’s a great noisemaker.
customer_reviews.author: Littlepup5

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to warn the squirrels before our 2 Wheatens go out into the garden - does the trick! A nice sound so as not to be obnoxious for the neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Needed more cowbell
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty, loud, and obnoxious enough to irritate my boy at soccer games! perfect!
customer_reviews.author: K. Spradlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice and loud! Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my horses, who come running at the sound of a bell. They can hear this across a very large pasture
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: MORE COWBELL!!
customer_reviews.text: First let me start off by saying: “I got a fever and the only prescription is COWBELL!” Bought this bad boy for our 8pm Covid 19 celebration and I think I will buy a few more for family and friends. Solid build cowbell with authentic sound a must for every connoisseur! Two thumbs up! Faaraz
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior Cow Bell
customer_reviews.text: This cow bell is everything and then some! It shipped fast and WOW is it LOUD!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great loud cowbell. I take it to the High School football games!

product_meta.title: 10 Inch Steel Cowbell with Handle Cheering Bell for Sports Events Large Solid School Bells & Chimes Percussion Musical Instruments Call Bell Alarm(Copper)
product_meta.description: Here's a cowbell that produces a loud, low tone that's just the prescription for sending sound over long distances. This durable cow bell features has a handsome antique copper-look finish along with a convenient hanger loop that allows the bell to be easily used with livestock or held by hand. A great steel cow bell for any home, farm, ranch or multipurpose use.It can be used for party noise makers,hand bell,football game cowbells,boys toys gifts.
feature_bullets: 【Super loud】Loud bell for cheering at sporting events,wedding,party,concert and so on.
【Alert bell】Perfect as a help bell to catch someone's attention.Such as your kids,your old parents and abstracted people.
【Excellent craft】Good production line and good source of materials.Handsome antique copper-style finish,comfortable grip handle.
【Noise maker】Make some noise! It will exceed your expectations!
【Warranty】100% satisfaction guaranteed! Warranty would be valid for 12 months.
